mapper.update:
update cere_platform_shop
shop_code = #{shopCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_brief = #{shopBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_phone = #{shopPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_password = #{shopPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
charge_person_name = #{chargePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
charge_person_phone = #{chargePersonPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_adress = #{shopAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effective_date = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effective_year = #{effectiveYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_state = #{contractState,jdbcType=BIT},
authentication_state = #{authenticationState,jdbcType=BIT},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=BIT},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=BIT},
authen_type = #{authenType,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
redit_code = #{reditCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduction = #{introduction, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

coordinate_y = #{coordinateY, jdbcType=DOUBLE},
classify_id = #{classifyId, jdbcType=BIGINT},
institutional_classify = #{institutionalClassify, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
institutional_grade = #{institutionalGrade, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
providers_major = #{providersMajor, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
providers_subclass = #{providersSubclass, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_collaboration = #{medicalcollaboration, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cere_platform_shop set shop_code = #{shopCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_brief = #{shopBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_phone = #{shopPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_password = #{shopPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_person_name = #{chargePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_person_phone = #{chargePersonPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_adress = #{shopAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effective_date = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effective_year = #{effectiveYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_state = #{contractState,jdbcType=BIT}, authentication_state = #{authenticationState,jdbcType=BIT}, check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=BIT}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, authen_type = #{authenType,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, redit_code = #{reditCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_classify = #{serviceClassify, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coordinate_x = #{coordinateX, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, coordinate_y = #{coordinateY, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, institutional_classify = #{institutionalClassify, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institutional_grade = #{institutionalGrade, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT shop_id FROM cere_platform_shop where shop_name=#{shopName}
SELECT shop_id FROM cere_platform_shop where shop_phone=#{shopPhone}
SELECT shop_id FROM cere_platform_shop where shop_name=#{shopName} and shop_id!= #{shopId}
SELECT shop_id FROM cere_platform_shop where shop_phone=#{shopPhone} and shop_id!= #{shopId}

SELECT a.business_user_id from cere_platform_business a LEFT JOIN cere_business_shop b ON a.business_user_id=b.business_user_id LEFT JOIN cere_platform_shop c ON b.shop_id=c.shop_id where c.shop_id=#{shopId}

SELECT a.shop_id, a.shop_code, a.shop_name, a.shop_brief, a.shop_phone, a.shop_password, a.charge_person_name, a.charge_person_phone, a.shop_adress, a.effective_date, a.effective_year, a.contract_state, a.classify_id, a.authentication_state, a.check_state, a.`state`, a.authen_type, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.medical_collaboration, b.business_user_id, a.redit_code, a.introduction, a.address, a.city, a.area, a.service_classify, a.coordinate_x, a.coordinate_y, a.institutional_classify, a.institutional_grade FROM cere_platform_shop a, cere_platform_business b where a.shop_phone = b.username and shop_id = #{shopId}

SELECT a.shop_id,a.shop_name,a.shop_code,a.charge_person_name,a.charge_person_phone, a.state,a.create_time,a.contract_state,b.business_user_id, a.redit_code, a.introduction, a.address, a.city, a.area, a.service_classify, a.coordinate_x, a.coordinate_y, a.institutional_classify, a.institutional_grade, a.classify_id, a.providers_major, a.providers_subclass, a.medical_collaboration FROM cere_platform_shop a JOIN cere_platform_business b ON a.shop_phone=b.username LEFT JOIN cere_product_classify c ON a.classify_id=c.classify_id where a.service_classify = #{serviceClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.shop_name like concat('%',#{shopName},'%')
and charge_person_name like concat('%',#{chargePersonName},'%')
and a.providers_major like concat('%',#{providersMajor},'%')
and a.providers_subclass like concat('%',#{providersSubclass},'%')
order by a.create_time desc
mapper.update:
update cere_platform_shop
effective_date = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effective_year = #{effectiveYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=BIT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cere_platform_shop
contract_state = #{contractState,jdbcType=BIT},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=BIT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.shop_id,a.shop_name,a.shop_code,b.revenue from cere_platform_shop a LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(price) revenue,shop_id,state from cere_shop_order where state in (2,3,4) GROUP BY shop_id) b ON a.shop_id=b.shop_id where 1=1
and a.shop_name like concat('%',#{shopName},'%')
and a.shop_code like concat('%',#{shopCode},'%')

SELECT IF(SUM(price) IS NULL,0,SUM(price)) FROM cere_shop_order where state in (2,3)
and shop_id=#{shopId}

SELECT IF(SUM(money) IS NULL,0,SUM(money)) FROM cere_order_reconciliation a LEFT JOIN cere_shop_order b ON a.order_id=b.order_id where a.type=2
and b.shop_id=#{shopId}
SELECT IF(SUM(price) IS NULL,0,SUM(price)) FROM cere_shop_order where state in (2,3,4)
SELECT IF(SUM(price) IS NULL,0,SUM(price)) FROM cere_shop_order where state=4
SELECT IF(SUM(withdrawal_money) IS NULL,0,SUM(withdrawal_money)) FROM cere_shop_withdrawal where state=0

SELECT a.business_user_id FROM cere_platform_business a LEFT JOIN cere_business_shop b ON a.business_user_id=b.business_user_id LEFT JOIN cere_platform_shop c ON b.shop_id=c.shop_id where c.shop_id=#{shopId}
SELECT * FROM cere_platform_shop where check_state=1 and state=1
